thread.title: 24 "Grey's Anatomy" Moments That'll Remind You How Good It Used To Be
thread.title_full: 24 "Grey's Anatomy" Moments That'll Remind You How Good It Used To Be

author: Jemima Skelley
title: 24 "Grey's Anatomy" Moments That'll Remind You How Good It Used To Be
text:
View this image ›
ABC ID: 10430486 But honestly, 13 seasons is a little much. And I think we can all agree that nothing will ever top the first five. View this image ›
ABC (That’s me talking to the show now.)
ID: 10430487 1. Like, remember when George was hopelessly in love with Meredith but she was too obsessed with Derek to even notice? View this image ›
ABC ID: 10422118 2. When Meredith and Cristina used to have huge tequila-filled nights. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10422173 3. And dealt with their problems by dancing it out. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10430475 4. When the hospital was overrun with syphilis, thanks to Alex. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10422208 5. When Addison showed up in Seattle and it was the ~first big twist~ of the show. https://greyingshepherd.tumblr.com/post/156370664808 View this embed ›
ID: 10429635 6. And basically every second she was on the show from then on. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10422121 7. When Meredith got high on painkillers. https://agreysuniverse.tumblr.com/post/156167109732 View this embed ›
ID: 10422175 8. When Izzie used baking as a coping tool. https://greyingshepherd.tumblr.com/post/156469667443 View this embed ›
ID: 10422209 9. When Meredith uttered what has become the show’s most iconic line. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10429625 10. When Izzie publicly clapped back to Alex shaming her Bethany Whisper ads. https://mostlypoptarts.tumblr.com/post/12794269944/just-remember-that-while-youre-sitting-on-two View this embed ›
ID: 10429627 11. And when the interns had a hot dog-eating contest. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10430503 12. When Derek and Meredith got down and dirty at prom, and she lost her panties. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10430228 13. Denny. :’( View this image ›
ABC ID: 10430053 14. Then when we got the heartbreaking “Chasing Cars” scene where Izzie quit, and Meredith walked away from both Derek and Finn. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10430419 15. When Sloan showed up and Derek punched him out in front of everyone. https://greyingshepherd.tumblr.com/post/156339555833 View this embed ›
ID: 10422116 16. And of course, when they named him McSteamy. https://greyingshepherd.tumblr.com/post/156455977508 View this embed ›
ID: 10429638 17. When Addison got loaded and kept calling Bailey “Amanda”. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10430227 18. This iconic elevator scene. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10429629 19. When Callie FINALLY kissed Hahn. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10430383 20. And when Hahn got very full-on and ranted about leaves and glasses. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10430049 21. When Cristina almost got married… without eyebrows. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10430158 22. And every second of Izzie and Alex’s wedding. https://springawakenings.tumblr.com/post/154434300695/greys-anatomy-meme-six-scenes-16-5x22 View this embed ›
ID: 10422215 23. When Alex and Addison had a short-lived but hot AF affair. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10430460 24. When Meredith built Derek a goddamn CANDLE HOUSE. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10430473 I miss you, Grey’s . View this image ›
ABC ID: 10437465
Jemima Skelley is a senior writer for BuzzFeed and is based in Sydney.
